description: A component that renders a styled-container or card for credit card.

mainSectionAmount.description: The card additional main section amount value.

mainSectionCurrency.description: The card additional main section currency.

mainSectionTitle.description: The card additional main section amount value.

secondarySectionAmount.description: The card additional secondary section amount value.

secondarySectionCurrency.description: The card additional secondary section currency.

secondarySectionTitle.description: The card additional secondary section amount value.

active.description: Whether the card should have a check icon. Defaults to true.

favorite.description: Whether the card should be marked as favourite. Defaults to false.

favoriteIconColor.description: The color of the favourite icon when favorite=true. Defaults to primary.

highlight.description: Whether the amount and currency value should be highlighted.

productNumberFormat.description: Configuration of how the product number should be formatted. Defaults to the following format: { length: 16, maskRange: [0, 12], segments: 4 }
